description: Empowering and Connecting the Community through ICT:  Egypt - Emergence of the Regional Digital Hub'

subproject.corporate outcome: Enhanced national capacity to use ICT for development as driver for pro-poor capacity development and institutional building
subproject.description: a) universal access policies and strategies developed and upgraded, b) ICT applications supported, c) innovation enhanced, d) legal and regulatory enabling environment created, e) human resources training & development support, f) knowledge sharing and internal management support systems established.
subproject.title: Empower.&Connect Com. thr. ICT
